
```{r}
go_enrich_file <- file.path("intermediate_results/", 
                            paste0(paste(my_contrast_name, "go", my_ontology, sep = "_"), ".rds"))

plot_folder <- file.path("plots/", paste0(my_contrast_name, "_go"))
dir.create(plot_folder, showWarnings = F, recursive = T)

if (!file.exists(go_enrich_file)) {
  go_enrich <- run_go_enrich(entrez_sig_vec, my_org_eg_db, ontology = my_ontology, 
                             plot_folder = plot_folder, id = 'entrez')
  saveRDS(go_enrich, go_enrich_file)
} else {
  go_enrich <- readRDS(go_enrich_file)
}
```

```{r}
plot_go_enrich(go_enrich$table$classic, "Fisher.classic", paste0(my_ontology, " - classic"))
```

```{r}
table_go_enrich(go_enrich$table$classic)
```

```{r}
plot_go_enrich(go_enrich$table$elim, "Fisher.elim",  paste0(my_ontology, " - elim"))
```

```{r}
table_go_enrich(go_enrich$table$elim)
```
